title: To-Do List Application
description: A dynamic To-Do List app for task management, featuring add, edit, complete, and delete functions, plus status filters. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Connect Four
description: Classic Connect Four game reimagined in a web app. Offers two-player mode, win detection, and restart game feature. Developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: Web-based Tic-Tac-Toe game allowing two players to compete, with automatic win and draw detection. Implemented with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for gameplay.
